mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APT ( HIST_STRT_DTS, HIST_END_DTS, APT_NM, RGN_CD, RGN_DTL_CD, ADDRESS, APT_YEAR, UNIT_AMT, PLOT_RATE, APT_DESC, REG_DTS, REGPE_ID, MOD_DTS, MODPE_ID ) VALUES ( NOW(), '9999-12-31 23:59:59', #{aptNm}, #{rgnCd}, #{rgnDtlCd}, #{address}, #{aptYear}, #{unitAmt}, #{plotRate}, #{aptDesc}, NOW(), 'joonwook', NOW(), 'joonwook' )

INSERT INTO APT_DTL ( HIST_STRT_DTS, HIST_END_DTS, APT_ID, TOT_AREA, USBL_AREA, ROOM_AMT, TOILET_AMT, HIGH_SELL_PRC, HIGH_SELL_DT, HIGH_RENT_PRC, HIGH_RENT_DT, APT_DTL_DESC, REG_DTS, REGPE_ID, MOD_DTS, MODPE_ID ) VALUES ( NOW(), '9999-12-31 23:59:59', #{aptId}, #{totArea}, #{usblArea}, #{roomAmt}, #{toiletAmt}, #{highSellPrc}, #{highSellDt}, #{highRentPrc}, #{highRentDt}, #{aptDtlDesc}, NOW(), 'joonwook', NOW(), 'joonwook' )

INSERT INTO APT_PRC ( HIST_STRT_DTS, HIST_END_DTS, APT_DTL_ID, PRC_TYPE_CD, DEAL_TYPE_CD, PRICE, PRC_DT, APT_PRC_DESC, REG_DTS, REGPE_ID, MOD_DTS, MODPE_ID ) VALUES ( NOW(), '9999-12-31 23:59:59', #{aptDtlId}, #{prcTypeCd}, #{dealTypeCd}, #{price}, #{prcDt}, #{aptPrcDesc}, NOW(), 'joonwook', NOW(), 'joonwook' )
